==Chinese==

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=huàshīyào
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# aromatic "dampness-dispersing" ''[[w:Materia medica|materia medica]]'' in [[traditional Chinese medicine]]. This term refers to herbs and other medicinal substances that are used to disperse "dampness" in the body.
